name: The Bouncies for Android
description:
You are given a selection of objects with different properties on each level. Your task is to place the right object on the right spot on the floor so that the Bouncies can reach the other side without touching the floor.

  • Original game play.
  • 3 Material Options that determine how far the jump will be
  • 11 Different objects
  • 150 Different levels
  • 3 Different Bouncies
  • Catch 3 treats per level for gold
  • Replay any level
  • You can skip levels and come back to them later
  • No timer, no fast click
  • You press GO when you're ready
  • Challenging and not as easy as it looks!
  • 2 skill levels:
    • Normal:
      The objects have predictable reactions with regard to bounces and balls rolling.
    • Expert:
      The objects are in a physics world and they won't always react predictably. Balls can roll in any direction and the Bouncies can fall between two objects or even a single object if they're too close to the side or going too fast.

This game is 95% identical to the Windows Version.

Because the how-to-play text is small and on certain devices cannot be zoomed - all the instructions are available here: How to Play The Bouncies Android

The Bouncies Game Demo for Android Devices from Evolutionary Games on Vimeo.
